name: Belle is Lost
description:
Made for the Wowie Jam 2019 ❤💕💕💖

Mind you, this game is incomplete. The basic core mechanics where everything interacts with everything is present but the real thing, called levels or challenges are missing. 🤢

We wanted to make an action puzzler.

Here's a video of the game in action : https://drive.google.com/open?id=1F29q1p6zFW_NXSkQejHqwQhkXidD4cQC

Regardless, you might want to play around with the bullets, the blocks etc.

Controls are simple, arrow keys to move, space to pick and shoot.🎈
